DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this pilot study is to evaluate the feasibility of microdialysis by laparoscopy in order to identify anastomotic leaks after rectal surgery.
DOC.criteria: rectal disease requiring proctectomy with anastomosis and stomy proctectomy by laparoscopy written consent history of colorectal surgery rectal surgery without anastomosis breastfeeding or pregnancy ASA score IV
